edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.classification

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.classification.Classifier

  • public class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This class runs the classifier on the clusters and stores the derived classes in the database.
    Author:
    Chris Neasbitt

      • updateClusterClasses

        public void updateClusterClasses(java.util.Date logDate,
                        int minCardinality)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Executes the classifier and stores the results in the database.
        Parameters:
        logDate - the clustering run date
        minCardinality - the minimum network cardinality of clusters to classify
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error creating the features file
